text: In the Spirit World Now is the sixth studio album by American punk rock band Ceremony. It was released through Relapse Records on August 23, 2019. ==Critical reception== In the Spirit World Now was met with generally favorable reviews from critics. At Metacritic, which assigns a weighted average rating out of 100 to reviews from mainstream publications, this release received an average score of 71, based on 7 reviews. ==Track listing== ==Charts== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! Chart (2019) ! Peak position |- |- |} ==References== Category:2019 albums Category:Ceremony (punk band) albums Category:Relapse Records albums
title: In the Spirit World Now
